abstract.t: NETLMM6 may be widely deployed in the 3G network. But currently,most of the mobile hosts are IPv4 nodes without any Mobile IPv4/IPv6stacks. This document proposes the solution to enable the IPv4 hoststo obtain the network connection and set up IPv4 sessions overNETLMM6 network. Extensions and option are added to proxy MobileIPv6 allowing for single IPv4 stack hosts to access kind of IPv6network. The IPv4 Address could be maintained constantly in thedomain of NETLMM6.
